name: operation, computer, desktop, with liquid crystal display, office use | operation, computer, desktop, office use | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10960/documentation

The computer desktop office use is calculated according to the share between active (5.5 hrs/day), standby (2 hrs/day) and off (16.5 hrs/day) modes taken from survey information. This dataset describes the application of an LCD monitor.;Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.

Describes the use of a desktop computer with a LCD monitor. Calculated per 1 hour of computer use at home.
category: J:Information and communication/62:Computer programming, consultancy and related activities/620:Computer programming, consultancy and related activities

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data is based on information in Japan. For the computer electricity use data information from various international manufacturers and computer types has been processed.;Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: No technology involved, except for the production of the desktop computer, which is described in another dataset.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see Geography and Technology. Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Producers, literature, survey and own assumptions

flow.name: operation, computer, desktop, office use
flow.category: J:Information and communication/62:Computer programming, consultancy and related activities/620:Computer programming, consultancy and related activities

exchanges.description: Literature value (Williams, 2005) state that computer, while used in the offie, is used 5.5 hours a day in the active mode, 16.5 hours in the off mode and approximatelly 2 hours a day in standby mode.
